title: Social Studies Competency Enhancement via Personalized Learning Pathway Design

context.prior_knowledge: Basic understanding of social studies concepts and digital device proficiency
context.additional_context: Students reconstruct social studies concepts by connecting personal learning experiences with external activities (volunteering, part-time work, etc.).

learning_goals: Learners connect their daily experiences with school learning to derive three or more real-life examples.
Using digital tools, learners design personalized learning pathways and select two or more learning strategies.
Based on peer and instructor feedback, learners complete a draft portfolio reflecting their learning experiences.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
